comment.body:
I propose:
```adblock
app.bionic-reading.com##.MuiDialog-root.MuiModal-root:has(#cookie_svg__a)
```
The `:has` is required as to avoid selecting other dialogs (i.e. the EULA). Blocking the cookie banner does prevent the "how to use" from showing, as it seems to only show when the cookie banner is closed.
